review: Bought this for our bedroom instead of paying for cable in a room we only watch tv at night. Great little tool, highly recommend!

review: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It barely lasted 6 mths. It's been having problems for the last month or so with locking up. Now it won't even power on. I have a Roku 2 & Roku 3 and have no issues. I definitely would NOT recommend this at all. Super disappointed.
author: Me
